The existence of a 13: page memo titled "COVID-19 Guidance for Hospital Reporting and FAQs" on the website of the U.S. Health and Human Services Department (HHS), which was updated on July 10, 2020.
The content of the memo: which outlined the modified guidelines for medical facilities to report COVID-19 patient data and the pandemic's impact on them.
The confirmation that the federal govern: under the direction of U.S. President Donald Trump, made changes to the data-collecting system for COVID-19 hospital information.
The report by The New York Times on July: 2020, which first brought attention to the claim and prompted further investigation.
